html:
A Stream Battle: Celebs vs Streamers has premiered on TNT TV?s Twitch channel. Scheduled to have thirteen streams, the new show is hosted by Vika Mccline and Jack Looney, the new digital stars of TNT, and invites Twitch, TV, and Internet stars as guests to battle in video games, both new and old titles, but still captivating ones.

Sber is the partner of the show. Its viewers can affect the stream outcome by voting for one of the teams in the SberBank Online application?s Dialogues section. The team with the most votes gets a difficulty increase.

The final stream is scheduled for December 11. This special project has been co-implemented with the SberMarketing agency.
